dict.acceptation: 使打起精神；使奋起；叫醒；唤起；

sent.orig: The quality index and AppCNR of STIR-EPI were better than SPIR(P<0.05)
Objective To explore the diagnostic value of STIR on bone contusion joint with low field MR.
sent.trans: 目的探讨低场磁共振短时反转恢复序列(STIR)在骨关节挫伤中的诊断价值。

sent.orig: STIR, T1WI were more sensitive lesion detection series in bone contusion(100% and 95.7%)
sent.trans: 2)检出骨挫伤敏感的MRI序列为STIR及T1W(I100%及95.7%)。

sent.orig: If necessary, stir in enough more flour to yield a hard-to-stir dough.
sent.trans: 如果有必要的话，可以加入更多的面粉使面团变硬，达到难以揉搓的程度。

sent.orig: Stir together vinegar, onion, apple, sauce, and sugar until sugar has dissolved, then stir in oil.
sent.trans: 把醋，洋葱，苹果，酱汁一起搅拌，再加入糖，使其充分溶解，再加入油搅拌。
